Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Authorizes the Good Samaritan Hospital Medical Center to file an application for exemption from real property taxes
Summary: Authorizes the Good Samaritan Hospital Medical Center to file an application for exemption from real property taxes.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the Good Samaritan Hospital Medical Center to file an application for a real property tax exemption
